menu.name: Margherita Pizza
menu.description: A classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves.

menu.name: Pepperoni Pizza
menu.description: A pizza loaded with spicy pepperoni slices, tomato sauce, and melted cheese.

menu.name: Vegetarian Supreme Pizza
menu.description: A veggie delight with bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, olives, and cheese on a crispy crust.

menu.name: Hawaiian Pizza
menu.description: A tropical twist with ham, pineapple chunks, tomato sauce, and cheese.

menu.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
menu.description: A smoky delight with barbecue chicken, onions, bell peppers, and mozzarella cheese.

menu.name: Supreme Meat Lover's Pizza
menu.description: A carnivore's dream with pepperoni, sausage, bacon, ham, and extra cheese on a thick crust.

menu.name: Four Cheese Pizza
menu.description: A cheese lover's delight with a blend of mozzarella, cheddar, provolone, and Parmesan.

menu.name: Vegan Delight Pizza
menu.description: A vegan-friendly pizza with plant-based cheese, assorted veggies, and marinara sauce.

menu.name: Barbecue Veggie Pizza
menu.description: A smoky veggie treat with barbecue sauce, bell peppers, onions, and corn.

menu.name: Pesto Chicken Pizza
menu.description: A gourmet pizza with pesto sauce, grilled chicken, sun-dried tomatoes, and feta cheese.

menu.name: Double Bacon Cheeseburger
menu.description: A hearty burger with double bacon strips, Angus beef patties, cheese, lettuce, and special sauce.

menu.name: Black Bean Burger
menu.description: A vegetarian option with a black bean patty, avocado, salsa, and chipotle mayo.

menu.name: Crispy Fish Burger
menu.description: A seafood delight with crispy fish fillet, lettuce, tartar sauce, and a sesame seed bun.

menu.name: BBQ Pulled Pork Burger
menu.description: A barbecue lover's choice with slow-cooked pulled pork, coleslaw, and barbecue sauce.

menu.name: Mushroom Veggie Burger
menu.description: A veggie delight with sautéed mushrooms, Swiss cheese, lettuce, and truffle aioli.

menu.name: Classic Cheeseburger
menu.description: A juicy beef patty topped with cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and mayo in a soft bun.

menu.name: Veggie Burger
menu.description: A meatless delight with a plant-based patty, lettuce, tomato, and special vegan sauce.

menu.name: Bacon Deluxe Burger
menu.description: A decadent burger with crispy bacon, Angus beef patty, lettuce, and tangy barbecue sauce.

menu.name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
menu.description: A gourmet treat with sautéed mushrooms, Swiss cheese, Angus beef patty, and creamy aioli.

menu.name: Spicy Chick'n Burger
menu.description: A fiery delight with a crispy chicken patty, spicy sauce, lettuce, and pickles.
